chinese: 我喜欢去哪买东西?
english: Where do I like to shop?

chinese: 购物可不是我的...我的运动.
english: Shopping is not my, my sport.

chinese: 我,实在不是那个谈论购物的人.
english: I, I am really not the guy to talk about shopping.

chinese: 我有个12岁的女儿,
english: I have a daughter who's 12.

chinese: 我发现我现在喜欢跟她一起去买东西.
english: and I found I enjoy shopping with her now.

chinese: 她已经长大了.
english: She's getting old enough.

chinese: 我跟她有时喜欢相同的东西,有时截然相反,
english: We like similar things or we like totally opposite things,

chinese: 但在一起很开心.
english: but it's fun together.

chinese: 如果可以找到不太拥挤的购物中心的话,
english: If we can find a mall that isn't as crowded,

chinese: 我们会去,
english: we'll go there,

chinese: 但大多数时候我们去社区商店.
english: but most of the time we go to neighborhood shops.

chinese: 我有时喜欢买东西.
english: Sometimes I like to shop.

chinese: 通常我更喜欢邮购, 而不是去购物中心,
english: Usually I prefer shopping from catalogs than going to the mall.

chinese: 因为那里人太多.
english: because there are too many people.

chinese: 谁给我买衣服?
english: Who shops for my clothes?

chinese: Er,我自己买我自己的衣服.
english: Er, I shop for my own clothes.

chinese: 我只在有需要时才去买东西.
english: I only shop when I need something.

chinese: 我买东西不是为了休闲娱乐.
english: I don't shop for pleasure.

chinese: 当我们年轻的时候, 买东西是我们的娱乐活动,
english: When we were younger, shopping was our recreation,

chinese: 但现在我做我不得不做的事情, 而且我在其他时候不会去做它.
english: but now I do what I have to do and I don't do it any other time.

chinese: 我是个真正的波西米亚人,所以我们结婚六年了,
english: I'm a real bohemian, so we've been married for six years

chinese: 我想我还未给自己买过一件衣服在这六年中, 如果那回答了你的问题.
english: and I don't think I've bought any of my own clothes in six years, if that answers your question.

chinese: 汽车零部件.
english: Automotive parts.

chinese: 我喜欢买汽车零部件, 有时.
english: I'm big on automotive parts, sometimes.

chinese: 购买食品.
english: The food shopping.

chinese: 我妻子购买所有的食品.
english: My wife does all the food shopping.

chinese: 我来自德国的法兰克福, 那儿每周都有跳蚤市场, um,在河边.
english: I'm from Frankfurt, Germany, and we have a flea market every week, um, near the river.

chinese: 我喜欢到那里买东西.
english: I like to buy there.

chinese: 有时我去逛商店, 即使我不想给自己买任何东西.
english: Sometimes I go shopping even if I don't want to find anything myself.

chinese: 如果有个朋友需要买什么, 我们就会走来走去, 看看衣服
english: If a friend needs something, we just walk around and look at clothes

chinese: and you know, 聊天和呆在一起, 有时这是一种社交活动.
english: and you know, and talk and hang out, sometimes it is a social activity.

chinese: 我更喜欢,er,家庭经营的小店,
english: I prefer, er, family-owned small businesses

chinese: 因为我认为,um,
english: 'cause I think, um,

chinese: 在那种店买东西更富有人情味.
english: there's a much more human quality involved in shopping in those stores.

chinese: 我认为让这类社区中心继续运转非常重要.
english: I think it's vital to, to keep those kind of community centers going.

chinese: 我觉得全世界的人都犯了一个极大的错误, 他们认为集中购物相当明智.
english: I think the biggest mistake they've made in all around the world is they think that centralizing shopping has become something that makes sense.
